title: Add check-progress workflow to prd-manager skill
description:
Add a quick way to check current PRD progress and active story status. Useful for Claude to quickly understand where Ralph is in execution.

The workflow should show:
- Current/next story ID and title
- Progress on current story (X/Y criteria checked)
- Overall PRD stats (completed/pending/blocked)
- Any partial progress or learnings

Workflow reads current story JSON and shows criteria progress

Can be invoked via /prd-manager check-progress or similar
